lines.text: Here I am, sitting in the center of a lot of wealth, the escalation in crime couldn't be better, and I'm not turning a damn nickel on it!
Are you seeing anybody? Just tell me that.
What... C'mon, you're not the abstinent type!
Oh, please don't judge me by your scrotal excesses!
I'm the only guy who knows what in the hell I'm doing!
I look upon a woman as a whole.
